decision: Using Prisma ORM for database access
rationale: Type-safe queries, excellent TypeScript integration, handles migrations
impact: All database queries use Prisma Client
Can't use raw SQL easily (must use $queryRaw)

decision: Storing JWT tokens in httpOnly cookies
rationale: Prevents XSS attacks, more secure than localStorage
impact: Cookie domain must match API domain

decision: Using optimistic UI updates for profile changes
rationale: Better UX, feels instant to user
impact: Must handle rollback on API errors
Need loading states for actual save

decision: Rate limiting per authenticated user, not per IP
rationale: Prevents abuse from shared IPs (corporate networks, VPNs)
impact: Rate limiter reads user ID from JWT
Anonymous users still rate-limited by IP
Need separate limits for auth vs unauth
